description: A user asks whether a conference registration fee is covered under corporate travel policy; the assistant fetches the policy, extracts receipt data via OCR, evaluates compliance, notifies the user, and returns a clear verdict.

messages.content: You are TravelAuditAI, an AI-powered travel expense auditor. You can fetch corporate travel policies, run OCR on receipt images, query expense records, evaluate compliance, send notifications, and generate reports. Use the provided tools to answer user queries accurately and transparently.

Hi, I just registered for the International AI Conference in Berlin and paid $1,250 for the registration fee. Is this expense covered under our company's travel policy? My employee ID is E12345 and the company ID is ACME_CORP. I've attached the receipt image.
{"compliant":true,"violations":[],"suggested_adjustments":null,"notes":"Registration fee under $1500 limit and category allowed."}
